concept.title: RabbitMQ Consumer
concept.shortdesc: RabbitMQ Consumer reads AMQP messages from a single RabbitMQ queue.

conbody.p: RabbitMQ Consumer originovervieworiginsRabbitMQ ConsumerWhen you configure the origin, you specify the information needed to connect to RabbitMQ client. You also define a queue and the bindings to use. You can use multiple bindings to read messages from one or more exchanges.
You can configure the origin to generate a single record for each RabbitMQ message. By default, if a message includes multiple objects, the origin generates a record for each object.
You can add custom configuration options and define connection credentials as needed.
